# The `ORCPlatformSupport` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A Platform-support class that implements initialize / deinitialize by forwarding to ORC runtime dlopen / dlclose operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

A Platform-support class that implements initialize / deinitialize by forwarding to ORC runtime dlopen / dlclose operations.

Definition at line 615 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/lljit-h">LLJIT.h</a>.
